jobDescription: Job Location: Bedford, MAResponsibilities:Support customers in the design, development, and deployment of Postgres-based data management solutions.Evaluate customer deployments of PostgreSQL, Postgres Plus Advanced Server, and related EnterpriseDB products and make recommendations concerning improvements.Develop an understanding of client businesses to develop recommendations, write code, and deliver training.Develop solutions balancing performance, usability, feasibility, and client satisfaction.
